summary.span: 表示 对象的集合，这些对象共同构成了 的几何图形。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that collectively make up the geometry of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 但如所述，此类的成员的行为如下所述完全， ，和文档。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **可冻结功能：** 从继承，因此类，类提供了一些特殊功能：可以声明对象，为在多个对象，进行只读的以提高之间共享性能，克隆，并进行线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为对象派生自，使用它们时都将复制它们。Because objects derive from , they are copied when they are used. 因此，更高版本，你可能无法检索或删除添加到集合使用原始对象。Therefore, later, you might not be able to retrieve or remove the you added to the collection using the original object. 集合中是一份原始和被认为是不同比你添加的一个。The in the collection is a copy of the original and is considered a different than the one you added. 此实现引发如果你尝试添加**null** (**执行任何操作**) 引用。This implementation throws an if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在第一个开始向前搜索集合和最后一个结束。The collection is searched forward starting at the first and ending at the last . 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比的值。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of . 也就是说，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*等同于。That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is equal to .
